body:
JA already supports loading JO models, but afaik the left hand saber tag is missing. It would be useful if you could re-export the auto-adjusted glm for further editing.

As requested in [a YouTube comment on my JA to JO video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srfpb2042lE&lc=UggLPTEYRFkV23gCoAEC.8BkBRe8OrRS9awy96w7K_N) and [on JKHub](https://jkhub.org/forums/topic/12415-i-need-help-converting-jk2-skin-model-to-jk3-model/).

Not to be confused with #40.

milestone.title: Tools
milestone.description: Make the game easier to mod.

title: JO player model to JA conversion
